Comment.Language: For the Feast of the Circumcision:

Text.Language: O who has accepted to Himself the circumcision / On the eighth day of Your birth, O Judge / Grant that we circumcise our hearts from transgression / Keeping the commandments and the laws.
يا من قبل اليه الختان: ثامن يوم ميلادك يا ديان: إعطى أن نختن قلوبنا من العصيان: محافظين على الوصايا والناموس.
All/louia (4) I/couc Pi,~rictoc Ps/ri m~V]: afswp e~rof m~picebi.
Alleluia (4). Jesus Christ, the Son of God, accepted to Himself the circumcision.
الليلويا (4) يسوع المسيح ابن الله قبل اليه الختان.
